title: Restaurant Review
description: Read a review about a new restaurant in the city.

passage.text:
I visited Bella Italia last weekend with my family. It's a new Italian restaurant on Main Street. The restaurant was quite busy, so I recommend making a reservation.

The menu has many options - pasta, pizza, salads, and seafood. We started with garlic bread as an appetizer. It was hot and delicious! For the main course, I had spaghetti carbonara, my wife had seafood pasta, and our son had a pizza.

The portions were generous, and everything tasted fresh. The chef uses high-quality ingredients. My wife said her pasta was the best she'd ever had!

The service was excellent. Our waiter was friendly and helpful. He recommended a nice Italian wine that went perfectly with our food.

The only downside was the price. It's more expensive than other Italian restaurants in the area. Our total bill was about $80 for three people, not including the tip.

Overall, I give Bella Italia 4 out of 5 stars. The food and service are excellent, but it's a bit pricey. I will definitely come back for special occasions.
